Job Title: Ellucian Banner Consultant - HR

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Consulting, Human Resources, Information Technology

Description:
At Ferrilli, we are committed to driving positive change in higher education through the revolutionary power of technology. Our mission is to foster student success by maximizing the potential of technology on campuses. With a comprehensive and holistic approach, we provide unwavering support in IT services and IT consulting, optimizing existing technology infrastructure, and implementing cutting-edge solutions to help our clients achieve their goals.
POSITION SUMMARY:As a Banner HR Consultant at Ferrilli, you will collaborate with colleges and universities to address their Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) needs, with a particular focus on Ellucian Banner HR. Your role is vital in ensuring that projects stay within scope and budget, in alignment with our clients' requirements. You will be part of the Professional Services team, reporting to a director, and ultimately, to the VP of Professional Services.
ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:Support application design and configuration of client systems through customization and coding of screen layouts, user interfaces, printed outputs, and interfaces with other systems to enable client strategies.Write and maintain technical specifications/documentation to describe program development, logic, coding, testing, changes, and corrections.Provide technical assistance by responding to inquiries from others regarding errors, problems, or questions regarding ERP and integrated systems.Attend both internal and external meetings and trainings.Analyze, define, and document requirements for data, workflow, safety processes and standards, hardware and operating system environment, interfaces with other systems, internal and external checks and controls, and outputs.Train end users or technical support staff to use programs.Build and apply technical, safety, industry, and functional standards to support efforts in enabling value creation for clients.Support the analysis and design of business processes.Maintain technical/professional currency and share knowledge with others.
QUALIFICATIONSA Bachelor’s degree in a related field is required.A minimum of 3 years of IT consulting experience and/ or hands on technical or functional experience in Ellucian Banner HR.Experience in implementing ERP solutions in the higher education industry will be advantageous.Proficient in managing and calculating scholarship-related data within the salary worksheets, ensuring accurate and compliant disbursement.Experienced in using salary planning tools and software to create, modify, and review salary worksheets for various staff members.Strong team player with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and clients.Willingness to travel when required for client or internal business.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
